chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
P: Set
V: Set
o: dio_op
q: dio_polynomial
p: dio_polynomial

Goal:
dp_size (dp_comp o p q) = 1 + dp_size p + dp_size q

Premises:
dp_size = fix dp_size (p : dio_polynomial) : nat := match p with | dp_comp _ p0 q => 1 + dp_size p0 + dp_size q | _ => 1 end : dio_polynomial -> nat
Inductive dio_polynomial : Set := dp_nat : nat -> dio_polynomial | dp_var : V -> dio_polynomial | dp_par : P -> dio_polynomial | dp_comp : dio_op -> dio_polynomial -> dio_polynomial -> dio_polynomial Arguments dp_nat _%nat_scope
gcd.bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> gcd.is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
Nat.add_assoc : forall n m p : nat, n + (m + p) = n + m + p
dp_eval_fix_add : forall (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial), dp_eval φ ν (dp_add p q) = dp_eval φ ν p + dp_eval φ ν q
Nat.mul_add_distr_l : forall n m p : nat, n * (m + p) = n * m + n * p
gcd.divides_mult : forall p q k : nat, gcd.divides p q -> gcd.divides p (k * q)
dio_repr_at_exst : forall (R : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a n m p : nat), dio_repr_at R a n p -> m = n + 1 -> dio_repr_at (fun ν : nat -> nat => exists n0 : nat, R n0·ν) a m p
gcd.bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ gcd.is_gcd p q g /\ gcd.is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
dp_eval_fix_mul : forall (φ : V -> nat) (ν : P -> nat) (p q : dio_polynomial), dp_eval φ ν (dp_mul p q) = dp_eval φ ν p * dp_eval φ ν q
Nat.add_1_r : forall n : nat, n + 1 = S n
dio_repr_at_bin : forall (o : dio_op) (R1 : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a1 n1 p1 : nat) (R2 : (nat -> nat) -> Prop) (a2 n2 p2 n : nat), dio_repr_at R1 a1 n1 p1 -> dio_repr_at R2 a2 n2 p2 -> a1 + n1 <= a2 -> n = 1 + a2 + n2 - a1 -> dio_repr_at (fun ν : nat -> nat => df_op_sem o (R1 ν) (R2 ν)) a1 n (1 + p1 + p2)
Init.Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
BinNatDef.N.mul = fun n m : BinNums.N => match n with | BinNums.N0 => BinNums.N0 | BinNums.Npos p => match m with | BinNums.N0 => BinNums.N0 | BinNums.Npos q => BinNums.Npos (BinPos.Pos.mul p q) end end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> BinNums.N Arguments BinNatDef.N.mul (_ _)%N_scope
BinNatDef.N.add = fun n m : BinNums.N => match n with | BinNums.N0 => m | BinNums.Npos p => match m with | BinNums.N0 => n | BinNums.Npos q => BinNums.Npos (BinPos.Pos.add p q) end end : BinNums.N -> BinNums.N -> BinNums.N Arguments BinNatDef.N.add (_ _)%N_scope
Nat.mul_sub_distr_r : forall n m p : nat, (n - m) * p = n * p - m * p
df_weight_1 = fix df_weight_1 (f : dio_formula) : nat := match f with | df_op _ _ _ _ => 8 | df_bin _ f0 g => 1 + df_weight_1 f0 + df_weight_1 g | ∃ f0 => 1 + df_weight_1 f0 | _ => 6 end : dio_formula -> nat
df_size = fix df_size (f : dio_formula) : nat := match f with | df_op _ _ _ _ => 5 | df_bin _ f0 g => 1 + df_size f0 + df_size g | ∃ f0 => 1 + df_size f0 | _ => 3 end : dio_formula -> nat
dio_polynomial_rect : forall P0 : dio_polynomial -> Type, (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial, P0 d
dio_polynomial_rec : forall P0 : dio_polynomial -> Set, (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial, P0 d
dio_polynomial_sind : forall P0 : dio_polynomial -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial, P0 d
dio_polynomial_ind : forall P0 : dio_polynomial -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P0 (dp_nat n)) -> (forall v : V, P0 (dp_var v)) -> (forall p : P, P0 (dp_par p)) -> (forall (d : dio_op) (d0 : dio_polynomial), P0 d0 -> forall d1 : dio_polynomial, P0 d1 -> P0 (dp_comp d d0 d1)) -> forall d : dio_polynomial, P0 d
Nat.mul_assoc : forall n m p : nat, n * (m * p) = n * m * p
Nat.log2_mul_above : forall a b : nat, 0 <= a -> 0 <= b -> Nat.log2 (a * b) <= Nat.log2 a + Nat.log2 b + 1
gcd.divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.divides (_ _)%nat_scope
dp_par_list = fix dp_par_list (p : dio_polynomial) : list P := match p with | dp_par x => x :: nil | dp_comp _ p0 q => dp_par_list p0 ++ dp_par_list q | _ => nil end : dio_polynomial -> list P
dp_var_list = fix dp_var_list (p : dio_polynomial) : list V := match p with | dp_var v => v :: nil | dp_comp _ p0 q => dp_var_list p0 ++ dp_var_list q | _ => nil end : dio_polynomial -> list V

```coq
intros.
unfold dp_size.
rewrite dp_size_equation.
simpl.
rewrite Nat.add_assoc.
auto.
Qed.

original: intros. unfold dp_size. rewrite dp_size_equation. simpl. rewrite Nat.add_assoc. auto.
